ves_blog_comment.content: Next you’re going to say that there’s no need for dinner courses and just mash it all together.

I used to make my own syrup for tonic, but it can be a lot of work/stuff to store. A bartender actually suggested this, rather than going for a syrup, simply add a small amount of the bark powder to soda (in a mixing tin) and then add it to the d
If you’re looking to up your cocktail game, this tonic syrup is easy to make, and can be customized by adding your own special ingredients.
Gin and Tonic knows no season nor time when it is not welcome.

Amen to that!

If you put it in front of me, it will be drank. Gin and tonic knows no season, moods or excuses. It’s there to be consumed in sadness and health, sunny morning and snowy midnights!

Now if you&rsquo

A bit early for summer drinks but all the more time to get prepared.

Didn’t know you chould buy chinchona bark so easily!

Goodbye Fever Tree, it was nice burning money on you, and I’ll never forget you.

Anyone have a line on getting quinine directly? Last I head it was restricted due to potential overdose issues. Unfortunately tonic made with bark inevitably has a brown tint and some different flavors than commercial tonic. Still good, but not a perfect

Amen to that!

If you put it in front of me, it will be drank. Gin and tonic knows no season, moods or excuses. It’s there to be consumed in sadness and health, sunny morning and snowy midnights!

What is amusing is the thumbnail for the video doesn’t do justice to what this technique does. The acutal technique uses gold color glue and makes the cracks stand out and look very beautiful. This stapled repair bowl is the one the emperor didn’t like an
This is a cool project, but don’t mix it with a tub that has jets the way they did in the video. Neither Epsom salts or oil are particularly good for the internal workings of the jets.
Hmm, I just might have time to whip some up while my fiancee’s at work tomorrow. I’ll let y’all know if it goes hilariously wrong.
Great job, very cool ! i wish you good luck for your theme
